group_1.narration: The rain showed no sign of stopping...
Fsshh, fsshhh... @As if the sky itself was weeping.

group_1.textRight: Awake, are ye?

group_1.textLeft: Eh... Granny...

group_1.textRight: Hm...
Your mother did a good job patching the girl up.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... That's because she used to be a nurse...
How is Shizuka?

group_1.textRight: She woke up just a moment ago.

group_1.textLeft: Really...? Even though her injuries were that bad...?

group_1.textRight: What do you think a Diviner is? You're beings that @fight against Devils.
She wouldn't go kickin' the bucket that easy.

group_1.textLeft: That's great... That's great~...

group_1.textRight: Oh, oh, don't cry.
She survived, after all! Ye should smile for her.

group_1.textLeft: *Sniff*.
Yeah.

group_1.textRight: So, shall we visit Tokime's head daughter together?

group_1.textLeft: Is it okay for me to go too?@Visitors are alright now?

group_1.textRight: Yes, it should be fine.
Shizuka!!

group_1.textLeft: Charu!

group_1.textRight: Thank goodness. I'm sorry! You were protecting @me...!

group_1.textLeft: Don't blame yourself, Charu.
It was my fault, overexerting myself when my power @was so exhausted.

group_1.textRight: But...

group_1.textLeft: And look, see? I can already move now.
Ouâ€” ouch...

group_1.textRight: C'mon, don't force yourself... You almost made my blood freeze out there.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Ms. Hiroe. You tended to her very well...

group_1.textRight: Oh, it's nothing. I was just trying to do what I could.
But it surprised me that the injury wasn't as serious @as I had imagined.

group_1.textLeft: A Diviner who fights against Devils is strong, after all.

group_1.textRight: So, once she's all better in a few days,
can we play together again? Can we fight Devils a @little longer?

group_1.textLeft: Charu...

group_1.textRight: W-what...?

group_1.textLeft: Y'see, dearie, I asked you to come here so you could give your last farewell..

group_1.textRight: Farewell?!

group_1.textLeft: It seems that I consumed quite a lot of power to @heal this injury.
...You'll see if you take a look.

group_1.textRight: Your Jewel's almost completely black...
Then, Shizuka...you're leaving the village...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
I'm sorry. I thought I could stay with you just a little while longer...
But it turns out that I can't...

group_1.textRight: You don't need to apologize! It's all because of me...!

group_1.textLeft: Anyhow, there isn't much time left.
I must apologize to all of ye, but we'll be holding the coming-of-age ceremony tomorrow.

group_1.textRight: Shizuka...

group_1.textLeft: It'll be alright. I'll meet you again outside, Charu!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, promise!
And you should bid farewell to Sunao too.

group_1.textLeft: I'm afraid she won't be able to come in time.

group_1.textRight: No way...

group_1.textLeft: So tell her that I'll meet her outside, alright?

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102601:lipSynch_1].........Okay.
